contextId.occurrenceNote: Possible meanings are 1) "join together with" or 2) "be the third blessing with" or 3) "be equal to." (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]])
This refers to the year after the second year. Alternate translation: "the year after that" or "in the following year" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]])
